title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 32.1 - When permitted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 32.1 - When permitted

State Regulations

Conditional examinations authorized
pursuant to sections
660.40
and
660.50
of the Criminal Procedure Law may
be conducted by means of videotape or photographic recording, provided the
recording is made in conformity with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
32.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
